casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Edward WAMPLLER. No. 38P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of January 2008 by Defendant for "Petition for Writ of Coram Nobis":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
